original_title: Kenji Mizoguchi, le cinéaste  à la cicatrice dans le dos
overview: This is a scar born from a knife strike in the back of the young Mizoguchi, coming from an enamoured jealous prostitute. This event enabled him to become the great cineast of women, and much more !
title: Kenji Mizoguchi, le cinéaste  à la cicatrice dans le dos
